alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:00PM MDT until July 08 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rawhide Buttes, or 9 miles south of Lusk, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing large hail in and near Lusk around 2:30 pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rawhide Buttes around 310 PM MDT. Prairie Center around 330 PM MDT. Jay Em around 335 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
